item.title: How do u make an ipban command? on OBEYPK source
item.dc:creator: @maxxy maxxy
item.description:
@maxxy wrote:

for the command usually search for

if(command.EqualsIgnoreCase("starter"))

then add the command above that

and for the appendtoIpBanned

public void appendToIPBanned(String ip)

search for that cause most servers have it they just dont work. if you dont have that look for this:

public void appendToBanned

item.title: How do u make an ipban command? on OBEYPK source
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Add this with your commands

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.appendToIPBanned(p.playerLastConnect);
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }
        }[/code]

And add the appendtoipban method

[code]public void appendToIPBanned(String ip) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/ipbans.txt", true));
 bw.write(ip);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sM("Error IP banning user!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic
